item.description:
Matt Reid, a Professional Organizer, certified ADHD Coach and life coach, teacher, and speaker will talk to us about decluttering and controlling procrastination. His emphasis will be on techniques and tools that are especially appropriate for people with ADHD. Matt's talk will also be helpful to people whose procrastination and/or clutter might not be related to ADHD.

The venue is a popular local restaurant in a room we'll have to ourselves. We'll network from 6:30 to 7:00 and start the meeting formally at 7 PM. We'll have the room from 6:00 on to allow members to arrive early to get something to eat/drink and to get to meet other members informally.

There will be time for questions and additional networking after the talk. We'll wrap up at about 9:00 PM. If bad weather is predicted, please check your email and this space to see if the meeting is still on.
item.name: Learn how to declutter and to activate from a Professional Organizer and Coach
